name: Girl's Flu
description:
You are an average dad. Your wife is overseas for business. Your daughter is having her first period, what do we do now?

Made during Global Game Jam 2015 for the theme - "What do we do now?"

Credits:

Programming: WY Leong (http://wyleong.tumblr.com)

Art: Mok (http://monosattva.tumblr.com)

SFX: generated with as3sfxr

BGM Music: Eric Skiff (http://ericskiff.com/music/)
